thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Casey
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Casey

author: Casey
title: Casey
text: I chose Omega Rental Cars because they were more affordable and had a city location that was more convenient than the airport one. The only issue was that the online booking form didn't make clear that I had to request an automatic. Luckily they were able to find another car that worked and were pleasant about resolving the issue. I would recommend them and use them again.
